code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;const getAuthHeader=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}};};export const orderService={createOrder:async orderData=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/orders/create"),orderData,getAuthHeader());return response.data;},getOrders:async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/orders"),getAuthHeader());return response.data;},getOrderById:async orderId=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/orders/").concat(orderId),getAuthHeader());return response.data;}};
